quotes: The love of a family is life's greatest blessing.
To us, family means putting your arms around each other and being there.
No Family Is Perfect. We Argue, We Fight. We Even Stop Talking to Each Other at Times. But in the End, Family Is Family. The Love Will Always Be There.
Family love is messy, clinging, and of an annoying and repetitive pattern, like bad wallpaper
The love of family and the admiration of friends is much more important than wealth and privilege.
I sustain myself with the love of family.

There's no vocabulary for love within a family, love that's lived in but not looked at, love within the light of which all else is seen, the love within which all other love finds speech. This love is silent.
The world, we'd discovered, doesn't love you like your family loves you.
Power, that's one thing, but love of family and of siblings is more important, is more powerful than any other power - at least earthly power, at least earthly power.
Love makes a family.

Because I had my family, I felt like I could be a bird and fly and experience and do. Because I had roots somewhere, I knew that they would love me no matter what, and I could always go back home and they were going to love me.
At the end of the day, a loving family should find everything forgivable.
Don't let the fire of love ever go out for your family. Stay strong and be a provider, give as much as you can and love them with all your heart.
There is no poverty in life when you have a loving, peaceful, happy family. They are a gift which cannot be bought nor traded for gold.
Family comes first. In a world full of unknown faces which do not care, the family comes in with all the love that there is to be found.
The love of the family, the love of the person can heal. It heals the scars left by a larger society. A massive, powerful society.
The only people that you really have, that I learned, are your family, because they love you no matter what.
Being a family means you are a part of something very wonderful. It means you will love and be loved for the rest of your life.
The most important thing a father can do for his children is to love their mother.
A family can develop only with a loving woman as its center.

Family isn't about sharing the same genetics, Thats being related, Family is when you love someone to death, and You would do anything for them, You trust them, Take care of them, And in Return they do the same. Its the type of bond you hold together.
Our family is a circle of strength and love...Our family with ever birth and every union the circle grows, our family is a circle of strength every crisis faced together makes the circle stronger.
There is no friendship, no love, like that of the parent for the child.
A home with a loving and loyal husband and wife is the supreme setting in which children can be reared in love and righteousness and in which the spiritual and physical needs of children can be met.

A loving family provides the foundation children need to succeed, and strong families with a man and a woman - bonded together for life - always have been, and always will be, the key to such families.
Home is where you are loved the most and act the worst.
It didn't matter how big our house was; it mattered that there was love in it.
Your family and your love must be cultivated like a garden. Time, effort, and imagination must be summoned constantly to keep any relationship flourishing and growing.

The family. We were a strange little band of characters trudging through life sharing diseases and toothpaste, coveting one another's desserts, hiding shampoo, borrowing money, locking each other out of our rooms, inflicting pain and kissing to heal it in the same instant, loving, laughing, defending, and trying to figure out the common thread that bound us all together.
It all comes down to family, love, and forgiveness, and respect.
That's how you know that your family loves you, when they feel free to scream at you.
Family values may have declined over the last century, but we still help our families when we can. You're family, Will.
Every family loves differently. Every love is unique.
Family shouldn't leave family. I'll always love you.
Family is power, Niklaus. Love, loyalty.
Please stay. There's nothing better than a happy family.
I love the family . Longer than longevity . Mother tells me what to be . Taller than the tallest tree . I love the family . Sister loves me tenderly .
Can't outrun the family . It gets me where I want to be .
He says be faithful always maintain integrity . Stick to your guns but hurt no one . And love your family .
Heart don't fail me now . Courage don't desert me . Home love family . There was once a time . I must have had them too . Home love family . I will never be complete .
When it's family, you forgive them . For they know not what they do . When it's family, you accept them .
And when it's family, you trust them . And your heart's an open door . When it's family, you tolerate .
You take the trouble as it comes . And love 'em more than anyone . Good or bad or indifferent .
Somehow you justify mistakes . Try to find some better way . To solve the problems day to day .
Need peace in the family . We all live many different lives . You and me, same inside . One love, same blood .
All of the people around us, they say . How can they be that close . Just let me state for the record . We are family, we are family .
A family is a place where minds come in contact with one another.
The best of believers in faith is one who is best in manners and soft in their dealings with their family members.
Family culture is based on the primary laws of love, which reflect the reality, and love in its purest form is unconditional.
Creating a beautiful family culture is to be proactive.
Strong family ties based in sound moral values is the very foundation for a healthy society, healthy adults and healthy children.
Rejoice with your family in the beautiful land of life.
You leave home to seek your fortune and, when you get it, you go home and share it with your family.
A woman can take care of the family. It takes a man to provide structure, to provide stability.
Family means no one gets left behind or forgotten.
A happy family is but an earlier heaven.
A family is a place where principles are hammered and honed on the anvil of everyday living.
Without a family, man, alone in the world, trembles with the cold.
When trouble comes, it's your family that supports you.
The only rock I know that stays steady, the only institution I know that works, is the family.
Spend sometime this weekend on home improvement; improve your attitude toward your family.
If one is desperate for love, I suggest looking at one's friends and family and see if love is all around. If not, get a new set of friends, a new family.
One of the things that binds us as family is a shared sense of humor.
Happy is said to be the family which can eat onions together. They are, for the time being, separate, from the world, and have a harmony of inspiration.
I think togetherness is a very important ingredient to family life.

One's family is the most important thing in life. I look at it this way: One of these days I'll be over in a hospital somewhere with four walls around me. And the only people who'll be with me will be my family.
I find the family the most mysterious and fascinating institution in the world.
The foundation of family - that's where it all begins for me.
In every conceivable manner, the family is link to our past, bridge to our future.
Call it clan, call it a network, call it a tribe, call it a family: Whatever you call it, whoever you are, you need one.
Families are about love overcoming emotional torture.
In every dispute between parent and child, both cannot be right, but they may be, and usually are, both wrong. It is this situation which gives family life its peculiar hysterical charm.

Marriage and family life are one way - the most important way without doubt - to secure in our lives the most marvelous and the most wonderful experience that we could ever have and share in this life: the experience of love - the experience of becoming a gift for each other.
A loving, caring family can help a child develop good self-esteem.
Healthy families make an effort to build relationships inside the home where their child can feel secure and loved.
Strong, stable, and healthy families are the foundation and building blocks our our society.
Families are what you make them and the ultimate connecting factor is love.
Families are ever changing in today's society. This shows that all families should be embraced and celebrated.
Every family is unique and every family has its own set of challenges, failures, joys, and successes.
Families are great! They may not all look the same. But the people all love one another.
Let love be genuine. Abhor what is evil; hold fast to what is good.
Thereâ€™s nothing I value more than the closeness of friends and family, a smile as I pass someone on the street.
Families are the compass that guides us. They are inspiration to reach great heights and our comfort when we occasionally falter.
The family is the best thing you could ever ask for. They are there for you during the ups and downs and love you no matter what.
Having a place to go - is a home. Having someone to love - is a family. Having both - is a family.
The bond that links your true family is not one of blood, but of respect and joy in each other's life.
To maintain a joyful family requires much from both the parents and the children. Each member of the family has to become, in a special way, the servant of the others.
Family. People in your life who are close to your heart. Who bring out the best in you, Who laugh, celebrate and dream with you. Who love you infinitely.
Family is people who loves us a lot. They are a special gift from God.
